title: Xenonauts (1.09 Patch) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here the 1.09 Patch for "Xenonauts. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed.


Changes for version 1.09:


- We have added the Developer Diary / development postmortem to the
game, which is found in the launcher (under the Extras button).

- We have made performance improvements on many of the maps.

- Harridans no longer occasionally fly out of the map and crash the game.

- Fixed some Soldier Equip screen crashes.

- Fixed a crash when dragging one soldier's equipment into the inventory
of another.

- Reapers no longer have a 0 reaction fire modifier, so are less
vulnerable to reaction fire.

- Using the Fury in combat no longer occasionally permanently grounds
one of your other interceptors

- Main Menu background artwork should now appear on all computers 


---------------------


Thxs to HanZie82 For Guide Notes


- Run and install setup_xenonauts_2.0.0.5.exe (in options you can select install directory)
- Run and install patch_xenonauts_2.0.1.6.exe patch
- Run and install patch_xenonauts_2.0.3.8.exe (This is from the separete torrent link below)

Launch by double clicking the shortcut made on desktop or by launching Xenonauts.exe from the install directory.
Select correct screenresolution and choose if you want to "Run in Window".
Then click "PLAY XENONAUTS".

If you like the game buy it, so you'll support the developers and make the game better!



Main torrent (setup_xenonauts_2.0.0.5.exe & patch_xenonauts_2.0.1.6.exe) <a href="
